Package edu.ntnu.idatt2001.runarin.backend.units.specialised

Class InfantryUnit

java.lang.Object
edu.ntnu.idatt2001.runarin.backend.units.Unit
edu.ntnu.idatt2001.runarin.backend.units.specialised.InfantryUnit
public class InfantryUnit extends Unit
A class for an infantry unit. This is a basic melee unit with normal attack power and armor resistance.
Since:
2022-04-17

  • Constructor Details

    • InfantryUnit

      public InfantryUnit(String name, int health, int attack, int armor)
      Constructor for instantiation of the InfantryUnit class.
      Parameters:
      name - description of the type of warrior; Archer, Swordsman, etc.
      health - number of remaining health points for the warrior. Value is decreased when taking damage.
      attack - attack points the warrior inflicts to an opponent (weapon damage).
      armor - armor points which decreases the damage taken from an opponent.

    • InfantryUnit

      public InfantryUnit(String name, int health)
      Simplified constructor for instantiation of the InfantryUnit class.
      Parameters:
      name - description of the type of warrior; Archer, Swordsman, etc.
      health - number of remaining health points for the warrior. Value is decreased when taking damage.

  • Method Details

    • getAttackBonus

      public int getAttackBonus(TerrainType terrain)
      Returns the attack bonus value. This value is used in the parent class method attack(Unit opponent). The unit have an advantage when fighting in FOREST terrain.
      Specified by:
      getAttackBonus in class Unit
      Parameters:
      terrain - deters the terrain the unit is fighting on.
      Returns:
      value of the attack bonus for an infantry unit.

    • getResistBonus

      public int getResistBonus(TerrainType terrain)
      Returns the resist bonus value. This value is used in the parent class method attack(Unit opponent). The unit have an advantage when fighting in FOREST terrain.
      Specified by:
      getResistBonus in class Unit
      Parameters:
      terrain - deters the terrain the unit is fighting on.
      Returns:
      value of the resist bonus for an infantry unit.
